title: The Best Non-Binary Fashion Ideas for Teens

steps.title: This is one of the most gender neutral pieces someone can wear.
steps.content: This is one of the most gender neutral pieces someone can wear. A (white) button up is very versatile and looks good on anyone since it matches with practically any bottoms. Try tucking the top into a pair of jeans or a black pants/trousers for a stylish, casual look. [2] X Research source This top can also look sexy if it's worn a certain way. Unbutton one or two buttons on the shirt for a seductive look. As an alternative to this, a plain sleeve (white) shirt works.

steps.title: Many people agree that overalls are a gender neutral piece.
steps.content: Many people agree that overalls are a gender neutral piece. Wear a plain shirt with overalls and a beanie for a minimalist look. This outfit can also hide curves without making your clothes look baggy. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Accessories should add to a good outfit.
steps.content: Accessories should add to a good outfit. Gender neutral accessories can be hard to pick, and can make or break an outfit. Try one of these accessories that work with most outfits: Suspenders Baseball caps Beanies Scarves Belts Ties or bows Embroidery patches or enamel pins (for a jacket) Sunglasses (only outside)

steps.title: Blazers are a staple in an androgynous wardrobe.
steps.content: Blazers are a staple in an androgynous wardrobe. A classic blazer is a great addition to the closet for anyone who wants to dress in a genderless or androgynous way. A nice way to style a blazer is make it have some good contrast. If you have a lighter skin tone go for a dark color but if you have a dark skin tone have some bright blazers with colors like yellow. [4] X Research source

steps.title: If you're into street style or the classic 90's fashion, this trendy outfit is just for you.
steps.content: If you're into street style or the classic 90's fashion, this trendy outfit is just for you. Choose a pair of dark cargo pants you love with an oversized tee to create a stylish outfit with attitude. This shirt layering technique looks great and has been worn since the 90's by icons like Kurt Cobain. It's also a nice outfit to wear during chilly weather. [5] X Research source

steps.title: This is another trendy style that looks great on anyone of any gender.
steps.content: This is another trendy style that looks great on anyone of any gender. Don't panic if you arenâ€™t into skinny jeans--a simple straight-leg pair of jeans might will look good on anybody.

steps.title: Hoodies are not only casual, but also comfy.
steps.content: Hoodies are not only casual, but also comfy. Most people have a favorite hoodie somewhere in their closet or one they wear often. Pair a graphic or solid-color hoodie with a pair of jeans and converse for a classic, and simple 'fit you can wear anywhere. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Bermuda shorts and Hawaiian shirts are popular garments with millions of wearers around the globe.
steps.content: Bermuda shorts and Hawaiian shirts are popular garments with millions of wearers around the globe. Wearing both together might not be everyone's idea of sartorial elegance, but go for it if you want! These typically brightly pattern garments give you a chance to wear something colorful, even floral, without it being feminine. Team a loose fit Hawaiian shirt with plain shorts or pants. Try Bermuda shorts with a tee-shirt or a light-weight sweat shirt.

steps.title: Converse are known for pairing with anything.
steps.content: Converse are known for pairing with anything. Not to mention, they can look super casual. Whatever gender you identify as or whatever look you're trying to pull off, converse will go well with your outfit.

steps.title: You can use jeans, leggings, shorts, or anything in between!
steps.content: You can use jeans, leggings, shorts, or anything in between! Polo shirts can come in so many different colors and patterns. They are great for expressing yourself, too.
